bibl.title: Two Greek Inscriptions from Polish Excavations in Old Dongola in the Collection of the National Museum in Warsaw.
bibl.note: 1. Funerary Stela of the Presbyter Stephanus, April 14, A.D. 797. - 2. Funerary Stela of Thomas, April 29, A.D. 799.
LAJTAR Adam, Two Greek Inscriptions from Polish Excavations in Old Dongola in the Collection of the National Museum in Warsaw.
